channel.title: Byron Sharman's blog
channel.description: The latest blog posts from Byron Sharman

item.title: Blasterhacks 2024: My First Hackathon
item.description: I'm trying to maximize the amount of fun I have in college, so when I heard my friends were signing up for a hackathon, I knew I had to try. As a freshman, I wasn't really sure it would be for me, but it turned out to be a blast! Here's how it played out.
